alert.note: Alert for Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:37PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Millard and southeastern Juab Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1237 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Scipio, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oak City, Mills and Yuba Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 195 and 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for central Utah.
